titles.title: Supporting the designation of the third week of November, November 14 to November 20, 2021, as "TED Awareness Week".
Supporting the designation of the third week of November, November 14 to November 20, 2021, as "TED Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of TED Awareness Week. Thyroid eye disease (TED) is a rare, progressive autoimmune condition that may result in pain, facial disfigurement, and vision impairment.
